author: zahary.
content: Sorry for the late answer, 61650 would be fine for our team as well

author: ajsutton
content:
Ok since all teams agree, I've raised a PR to update Pyrmont to the new preset based format and add in 61650 as the altair fork epoch: https://github.com/eth2-clients/eth2-networks/pull/56
I'd appreciate people giving it a very careful review to ensure I didn't miss any customized Pyrmont settings (it has found peers and is syncing fine for me).
